price: dhugumatti, Nuti gubbaa keessanitti samii torba uumnee jirra, Nuti uumamtoota irraa kan dagannu hin taane
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا فَوۡقَكُمۡ سَبۡعَ طَرَآئِقَ وَمَا كُنَّا عَنِ ٱلۡخَلۡقِ غَٰفِلِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā fawqakum sabʿa ṭarāiqa wamā kunnā ʿani al-khalqi ghāfilīna
